sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-counter-component', templateUrl: './counter.component.html', styleUrls: ['./counter.component.css'] }) export class CounterComponent { public currentCount = 0; public currentCount2 = 0; deshabilitar = false; public incrementCounter() { this.currentCount++; } public incrementCounter2() { this.currentCount2 += 2; } public ResetCounters() { this.currentCount = 0; this.currentCount2 = 0; } }

Portfolio

Con esto hacemos que se incremente de uno en uno.

De 1 en 1: {{ currentCount }}

De 2 en 2: {{ currentCount2 }}

    WORK EXPERIENCE

  • FULLSTACK SOFTWARE DEVELOPER INDRA SOFTWARE LABS(21/03/2022 – 17/03/2023 Ciudad Real, Spain)

    I was working in INDRA developing applications in Visual Basic .Net,WPF and SQL Server, making corrections and evolutions of the project, both frontend and backend. I was also working with the project server that used Java. Inside the server, I was modifying, adding and correcting some SQL queries that required maintenance
